sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jǐnkuài wánchéng zhè xiàng gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez terminer ce travail dès que possible.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please finish this work as soon as possible.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ nǐ de jiǎnlì fā gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'envoyer votre CV.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send me your resume.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jìnzhǐ xīyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de fumer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is prohibited here.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一本关于近代历史的书。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī běn guānyú jìndài lìshǐ de shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un livre sur l'histoire moderne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a book about modern history.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jìngrán wàng le wǒ de shēngrì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a oublié mon anniversaire !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He actually forgot my birthday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī bù jīngdiǎn diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un film classique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a classic movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jìngtóu pāi de hěn měi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette prise de vue est très belle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This shot is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài jìngzi qián huàzhuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle se maquille devant le miroir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is putting on makeup in front of the mirror.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhùfú nǐmen xìngfú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vous souhaite beaucoup de bonheur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I wish you happiness.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiánmiàn yǒu yī gè jiāyóuzhàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une station-service devant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a gas station ahead.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiǎoqū yǒu hěn duō jūmín.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de résidents dans ce quartier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many residents in this community.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù jiǔbā hē yī bēi ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons prendre un verre au bar.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go to a bar for a drink.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiūjìng fāshēng le shénme shì?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Que s'est-il passé exactement ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What exactly happened?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jùbèi dāng lǐngdǎo de nénglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a les capacités pour être un leader.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has the ability to be a leader.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài Běijīng jūzhù le shí nián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a vécu à Pékin pendant dix ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has lived in Beijing for ten years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jùlí xuéxiào hěn jìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est très proche de l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It is very close to the school.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kèrénmen lùxù dàodá le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les invités sont arrivés les uns après les autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The guests arrived one after another.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒmen yǒu yī gè jùhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons une fête ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have a party this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhǐshì kāi wánxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je plaisante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm just joking.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在电影中扮演主要角色。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài diànyǐng zhōng bànyǎn zhǔyào juésè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il joue le rôle principal dans le film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He plays the main role in the movie.
